Name: Dungeon Tactics
About the game: A retro style party based RPG smashing together concepts from several of my favorite games! Build and name a party of 3, then 6 characters with a large selection of male and female (few cats too) character avatar sprites. Explore the 15 levels of the dungeon to protect the people of Airi from the secret threat contained within. Many original music tracks throughout! Jobs: Combine any number of the 40 jobs on each character. Each job has Active, Reactive, and Passive skills. Only the 2 assigned jobs Active skills will be available during combat. Gain JP from battles for your 2 currently active jobs. Spend JP on skill levels OR your mastery bar for stats, hp, energy, and to unlock reactive and passive skills. Find combinations of jobs that complement each other through damage type synergies, damage type buffs, heals, damage shields, pets, and a few wacky effects! Dungeon: Find switches, levers, and fake walls to uncover previously blocked pathways. Avoid many traps set in place to hinder your progress including fire, lightning, arrows, cannons, elemental whirlwinds, bubble guns, and more! Procedurally generated items from chests and monsters, with random weightings towards different stats along with random bonuses. Every non-boss monster has at least 1 rare item they can drop! Approximately 20-30h for a single playthrough. Game is definitely best played with a controller!
